ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards abilities redefined was: Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... An enchanter s heals are in preventing the group from taking damage via stuns and (the expensive) runes.  So yes, they can as easily heal one person as
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 30 Mar 2000, Reeves, Patrick W wrote:
>
> Actually, enchanters work like this too.
> ----------------------------------------------------
>
> Ya, but can the enchanter as easily heal one person as six? :) or Dot one
> mob as 10?

An enchanter's "heals" are in preventing the group from taking
damage via stuns and (the expensive) runes. So yes, they can
as easily "heal" one person as six. Arguably better since
they can do it while taking little to no damage themselves.
If you're grouped with a good enchanter, you could be forced
to rely on a ranger for heals and that should be enough.

You've got me on the DoT thing. But like I said, you need a
rather specialized group makeup and mob selection to get it to
work right.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
